history.proof: intros Hinvert Hinverse. unfold Zp_invertible in Hinvert. destruct Hinvert as [i Hi]. rewrite <- Zp_mult_one_r. qsimpl use: Zp_mult_assoc. qsimpl use: Zp_mult_assoc. rewrite Zp_mult_one_r. qsimpl use: Zp_mult_assoc,Zmult_1_l. scongruence use: Zp_mult_one_r, Zp_mult_comm.

original: intros Hinvert Hinverse. unfold Zp_invertible in Hinvert. destruct Hinvert as [i Hi]. intro Hmult. rewrite <- Hmult. rewrite <- Zp_mult_assoc. rewrite Hi. rewrite Zp_mult_one_r. rewrite Zmult_1_l. reflexivity.
